sentences.en: A gust of wind blew the flickering candle out.
sentences.cn: 一阵风把闪烁不定的蜡烛吹熄了.

sentences.en: Back row of the driving show in the flickering light.
sentences.cn: 观光车的最后一排显出摇动的灯光.

sentences.en: One of the greatest problems of electronic dashboards is flickering of the display.
sentences.cn: 电子仪表的最大问题之一是显示值的波动.

sentences.en: Out on the water flickering lights and soft - voiced choruses marked the fishers returning from the reef.
sentences.cn: 远远的水面上,灯光摇曳,轻歌荡漾,说明渔人正在收帆夜归.

sentences.en: She was reading by the flickering light of the candle.
sentences.cn: 她借着闪烁的烛光读书.

sentences.en: The candles cast long flickering shadows on the walls.
sentences.cn: 这些蜡烛在墙上投射出长长的摇曳的阴影.

sentences.en: The crisp autumn wind is flickering away.
The flickering insect halo began to drift slowly away, keeping a constant six feet above the earth.
sentences.cn: 忽隐忽现的昆虫光环开始慢慢地漂移，一直保持离地六英尺的高度。

sentences.en: The larger stars overhead came out slow and flickering.
sentences.cn: 天上比较大的星星出来得很慢,并且还闪烁不定.

sentences.en: The leaves are flickering in the wind.
The lights were dim, flickering in the cold.
sentences.cn: 我望着这些灯, 灯光带着昏黄色,似乎还在寒气的袭击中微微颤抖.

sentences.en: There was an indescribable flickering glow in his eyes, creating a fearsome and wholly unnatural effect.
sentences.cn: 他的眼里射出一种无法形容的闪烁的光辉, 给人以一种可怕的、完全不正常的感觉.

sentences.en: There was something strange about the flickering blue light.
They all looked at him. The shadows on their faces shifted in the flickering candlelight.
sentences.cn: 所有的目光都向他投去, 他们脸上的阴影在闪烁不定的烛光中变换着.

words.tran_cn: 弹开；快速的轻打；轻打声
轻弹；忽然摇动；轻轻拂去
闪烁；摇曳；颤动；扑动翅膀；假装昏倒
轻弹；忽然摇动；轻轻拂去
闪烁的，忽隐忽现的；摇曳的

trans.tran_cn: 闪烁的，摇曳的，忽隐忽现的，一闪一闪的
（通常指灯光）闪烁，摇曳( flicker的现在分词 )
